Sentencas: The purpose of this study is to perform an energetic-exergetic comparison between two micro-cogenerative (CHP) units for residential applications, based on Proton Exchange Membrane fuel cell (PEMFC) and Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) respectively.
Titulo: An energetic-exergetic comparison between PEMFC and SOFC-based micro-CHP systems

Sentencas: Such systems, both fed by natural gas, are dedicated to electricity and heat production for typical residential users.
Titulo: An energetic-exergetic comparison between PEMFC and SOFC-based micro-CHP systems

Sentencas: Simulations of two zero-dimensional models in Aspen Plus environment have been conducted in order to perform the comparison.
Titulo: An energetic-exergetic comparison between PEMFC and SOFC-based micro-CHP systems

Sentencas: Results obtained by the simulations have been compared on the basis of the First and the Second Law efficiencies aiming to find the most advantageous technology for small residential applications.
Titulo: An energetic-exergetic comparison between PEMFC and SOFC-based micro-CHP systems

Sentencas: Results analyses indicate that the PEMFC-based CHP system, operating at atmospheric pressure and low temperature, is the most efficient system.
Titulo: An energetic-exergetic comparison between PEMFC and SOFC-based micro-CHP systems
An energetic-exergetic comparison between PEMFC and SOFC-based micro-CHP systems
